1    | /**************************************************************************
2    | $Header: AGWSUBS.H Sun 08-06-2000 11:11:21 am HvA V1.00 $
3    | ***************************************************************************/
4    | 
5    | 
6    | #ifndef __agwsubs_h__
7    | #define __agwsubs_h__
8    | 
9    | #include "agwhdr.h"
10   | 
11   | /*+ Bit masks for AGWPE interface status +*/
12   | #define AGWPE_ACTIVE		0x0001	/*+ AGWPE is active and connection is made +*/
13   | #define STATION_CONNECTED	0x0002	/*+ We have a connection to another station +*/
14   | #define TN_LISTENING    	0x0008	/*+ No tn client connected but server is listening +*/
15   | #define TN_CONNECTED    	0x0010	/*+ A tn client is connectd +*/
16   | #define CMD_MODE			0x0020	/*+ This interface is in command mode +*/
17   | 
18   | /*+ Initialize agwpe interface +*/
19   | int agwpe_init(char *address, char *portnr);
20   | 
21   | /*+ Request version information from AGWPE +*/
22   | void  agwpe_get_ver(void);
23   | 
24   | /*+ Register 'callsign' to AGWPE  +*/
25   | int   agwpe_register(char *callsign);
26   | 
27   | /*+ Unregister 'callsign' from AGWPE  +*/
28   | int   agwpe_unregister(char *callsign);
29   | 
30   | /*+ Enable monitored frames to be send from AGWPE +*/
31   | int   agwpe_monitor(void);
32   | 
33   | /*+ Print header of S,U,I,T frames  +*/
34   | void  agwpe_printhdr(BYTE *data);
35   | 
36   | /*+ Process incoming pctcp headers and data frames +*/
37   | void  agwpe_process(void);
38   | 
39   | /*+ Connect to another station  +*/
40   | int agwpe_connect(int port, char *callsign);
41   | 
42   | /*+ Disconnect from another station  +*/
43   | int agwpe_disconnect(int port, char *callsign);
44   | 
45   | /*+ Ask for list of heard stations  +*/
46   | int agwpe_heard(int port);
47   | 
48   | /*+ Send data over the connection to the other station +*/
49   | int agwpe_send_data(int port, char *callsign, char *data);
50   | 
51   | #endif
